personalInfo.name: Babylon's
personalInfo.title: DevOps Engineer | AI Instructor | Computer Science Educator
personalInfo.quote: Technology serves those who serve their nation
personalInfo.statement: Committed to leveraging cutting-edge technology in service of national defense and education. Every line of code written with the purpose of advancing our nation's technological capabilities and preparing future generations of military technologists.

expertise.title: Military Technology Specialist
expertise.description: DevOps engineer specializing in secure, scalable systems for military applications. Expert in developing robust infrastructure solutions that meet the demanding requirements of defense operations.

expertise.title: Artificial Intelligence Educator
expertise.description: Leading instructor in AI and machine learning technologies, developing comprehensive curricula that prepare military personnel for the future of digital warfare and intelligence operations.

expertise.title: Full-Stack Development
expertise.description: Comprehensive expertise in modern web technologies, creating sophisticated applications that serve both educational and operational needs within the military framework.

expertise.title: Technology Leadership
expertise.description: Committed to fostering the next generation of military technologists through innovative teaching methodologies and hands-on practical training programs.

initiatives.title: AI-Powered Military Training
initiatives.description: Developing cutting-edge educational platforms that utilize artificial intelligence to enhance military training effectiveness and create adaptive learning experiences tailored to individual learning patterns.

initiatives.title: Signal Intelligence Solutions
initiatives.description: Creating innovative technological solutions for signal intelligence applications that strengthen national defense capabilities and enhance communication security protocols for military operations.

initiatives.title: Next-Generation Engineers
initiatives.description: Mentoring and developing the next generation of military software engineers through comprehensive training programs, practical project implementation, and advanced technical skill development.

initiatives.title: Open Source Contribution
initiatives.description: Contributing to open-source projects that benefit the defense community while maintaining the highest standards of security and operational excellence, fostering innovation in military technology.

achievements.label: Years Experience
achievements.description: Decade of professional experience in military technology and education

achievements.label: Students Taught
achievements.description: Military personnel trained in advanced technology and AI concepts

achievements.label: Projects Completed
achievements.description: Successfully implemented technology solutions for defense applications

achievements.label: Mission Success
achievements.description: Perfect track record in delivering critical military technology solutions

awards: Outstanding Service to Royal Thai Army 2022
